header.title: Dithulusi tša Salatiso OHS
intro.title: Polokego ya Kago
intro.description: Netefatša go latela melao ya bophelo le polokego ya kago ka dithulusi tša Salatiso OHS. Dithuto tša rena di go thuša go laola dikotsi, go latela ditlhokego tša molao, le go šireletša bašomi setšheng, ka go šomiša mekgwa ye botse e hlalošitšwego mo "Polokego Pele: Ditlhokego tša Dithulaganyo tša OHS."
intro.download_link: Tšhupulla Thulaganyo ya OHS ya Kago: Kgotla Mo
legal_obligations.client.title: Maikarabelo a Mokgatho
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_a: Molao wa Kago 5(1)(a): Lokisetsa Tekolo ya Kotsi ya Motheo (BRA) ye e hlalosago dikotsi tša projeke.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_b: Molao wa Kago 5(1)(b): Fana ka Tlhaloso ya Bophelo & Polokego ye e hlalosago ditlhokego tša projeke tše di kgethegileng.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_l: Molao wa Kago 5(1)(l): Amogela Thulaganyo ya Bophelo & Polokego ya Mokgatho pele mosebetsi o thoma.
legal_obligations.contractor.title: Maikarabelo a Mokgatho
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_a: Molao wa Kago 7(1)(a): Hlama Thulaganyo ya Bophelo & Polokego e theilwego mo tlhalosong ya mokgatho.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_b: Molao wa Kago 7(1)(b): Boloka Faele ya Bophelo & Polokego setšheng e nago le ditokomane tše di hlokegago ka moka.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9: Molao wa Kago 9: Dira Tekolo ya Kotsi le go Hlalosa Kotsi (HIRAs) ka mokgwa o kgethegileng.
legal_obligations.professional.title: Maikarabelo a Profešenale ya H&S
legal_obligations.professional.reg_5_5: Molao wa Kago 5(5): Baemedi (PrCHSA) ba laola H&S legameng la mokgatho, ba netefatša go latela.
legal_obligations.professional.reg_8_5: Molao wa Kago 8(5): Baofisiri (CHSO) ba thusa Bakgatho go šomiša le go hlokomela dithulaganyo tša H&S.
legal_obligations.professional.sacpcmp: Melawana ya SACPCMP: Ba swanetše go boloka ngwadišo le ditlhokego tša CPD tša maemo a profešenale.

action_buttons.hs_plan: Hlama Thulaganyo ya Bophelo le Polokego
action_buttons.hs_file: Hlama Faele ya Bophelo le Polokego

cart.title: Sekhwama sa Gago
cart.invoice_reference: Nomoro ya Tšhupetšo ya Invoise: (E šoma matsatsi a 7. Ngwadiša go boloka ka go sa felego!)
resources.title: Ikgokaganye le Bašomi ba H&S ba go Amogelwa
resources.description: O nyaka thušo ya setsebi? Ikgokaganye le bašomi ba go amogelwa ka ditlhokego tša projeke ya gago.
resources.jane_doe: Jane Doe, Ejenste ya SACPCMP (PrCHSA) - Nomoro ya Ngwadišo: PR12345 - Ikgokaganya: jane.doe@example.com
resources.john_smith: John Smith, Ofisiri ya SACPCMP (CHSO) - Nomoro ya Ngwadišo: CHSO67890 - Ikgokaganya: john.smith@example.com

footer.newsletter.title: Dula o le Dintlha
sidebar.step_0.title: 📜 Go Latela ga OHS
sidebar.step_0.description: Thoma ka go kgetha tirelo go netefatša go latela Molao wa Bophelo le Polokego mo Mosebetsing.
sidebar.step_0.fun_fact: ⚡ Taba ye e Thabišago: Na o tseba gore ditokomane tša OHS tše di nepagetšego di ka fokotša ditiragalo tša mošomo ka 30%? A re thomeng!
sidebar.step_1.title: 📋 Molao
sidebar.step_1.description: Molao wa Kago 5(1)(b) o nyaka Tlhaloso ya Bophelo le Polokego ya diprojeke tšohle, mola 7(1)(b) e nyaka Faele ya H&S.
sidebar.step_1.fun_fact: 🛡️ Taba ye e Thabišago: Tlhaloso ya H&S ye e tiileng e ka fokotša dikotsi ka 30%! E swana le thebe ya polokego ya projeke ya gago.
sidebar.step_2.title: 📋 Molao
sidebar.step_2.description: Molao wa Kago 5: Bakgatho ba swanetše go fana ka Tlhaloso ya Bophelo & Polokego le go netefatša go latela ga bakgatho.
sidebar.step_2.fun_fact: 💼 Taba ye e Thabišago: Bakgatho ba bolokago ngwadišo ya COIDA ba ka šitiša ditshenyeletšo tše kgolo—boloka nomoro yeo kgauswi!
sidebar.step_3.title: 📜 Molao
sidebar.step_3.description: Molao wa Kago 7(1)(a): Bakgatho ba swanetše go hlama Thulaganyo ya Bophelo & Polokego e theilwego mo tlhalosong ya mokgatho.
sidebar.step_3.fun_fact: 🤝 Taba ye e Thabišago: Go thwala mokgatho kapele go ka potlakisa go latela—mošomo wa sehlopha o dira gore lorato la polokego le šome!
sidebar.step_4.title: 📋 Molao
sidebar.step_4.description: Molao wa Kago 7(1)(b): Bakgatho ba swanetše go boloka Faele ya Bophelo & Polokego setšheng e nago le ditokomane tšohle tše di hlokegago.
sidebar.step_4.fun_fact: 📞 Taba ye e Thabišago: Go ba le dintlha tša go ikgokaganya tša mokgatho tše di lokileng go ka šireletša letšatši la tšhoganetšo—dula o kgokagane!
sidebar.step_5.title: 📜 Molao
sidebar.step_5.description: Molao wa Kago 3(1): Tumelelo e a hlokega bakeng sa diprojeke tše di fetago R40,000 goba tše di tšwelago matsatsi a fetago 180.
sidebar.step_5.fun_fact: 🚧 Taba ye e Thabišago: Aterese tša setšhe tše di hlalago di thuša ditirelo tša tšhoganetšo go go hwetša ka pele—se ke wa dumelela phošo ya go ngwala go šitiša thušo!
sidebar.step_6.title: 📋 Molao
sidebar.step_6.description: Molao wa Kago 9: Tekolo ya Kotsi le go Hlalosa Kotsi (HIRAs) ka mokgwa o kgethegileng e a hlokega bakeng sa mediro yohle.
sidebar.step_6.fun_fact: 🔍 Taba ye e Thabišago: Go lemoga mediro ye e nago le kotsi kapele go ka fokotša dikotsi ka 25%—e swana le go fa projeke ya gago maatla a polokego!
sidebar.step_7.title: 📜 Molao
sidebar.step_7.description: Melawana ya SACPCMP: CHSO le PrCHSA ba swanetše go boloka ngwadišo le ditlhokego tša CPD go netefatša go latela.
sidebar.step_7.fun_fact: 🧑‍💼 Taba ye e Thabišago: Profešenale ya SACPCMP ye e ngwadišitšwego e ka fokotša dikotsi tša molao kudu—MVP ya polokego ya projeke ya gago!
sidebar.step_8.title: 📋 Molao
sidebar.step_8.description: Molao wa Kago 5(1)(l): Bakgatho ba swanetše go amogela thulaganyo ya H&S ya mokgatho pele mosebetsi o thoma.
sidebar.step_8.fun_fact: 📝 Taba ye e Thabišago: Maikarabelo a hlalago mo ditokomaneng a ka kgontšha pepenenego ya projeke—yo mongwe le yo mongwe o tseba maemo a gagwe!
sidebar.step_9.title: 📜 Molao
sidebar.step_9.description: Molao wa Bophelo le Polokego mo Mosebetsing: Ditokomane tše di nepagetšego di netefatša go latela le go šireletša bohle bao ba amegago.
sidebar.step_9.fun_fact: 🛒 Taba ye e Thabišago: Sekhwama sa gago ke setšhuphutso sa gago sa polokego—tokomaneng ye nngwe le ye nngwe ye o e oketšago e dira gore projeke ya gago e be le polokego!
